00037 using namespace Serialization;

00039 void RequestHandlerOpen::run() {
00040   ResponseCallbackOpen cb(m_comm, m_event_ptr);
00041   size_t remaining = m_event_ptr->message_len - 2;
00042   const uint8_t *msg = m_event_ptr->message + 2;
00043   Attribute attr;
00044   std::vector<Attribute> attrs;
00045 
00046   try {
00047     uint32_t flags = decode_i32(&msg, &remaining);
00048     uint32_t event_mask = decode_i32(&msg, &remaining);
00049     const char *name = decode_vstr(&msg, &remaining);
00050     uint32_t attr_count = decode_i32(&msg, &remaining);
00051 
00052     while (attr_count--) {
00053       attr.name = decode_vstr(&msg, &remaining);
00054       attr.value = decode_vstr(&msg, &remaining, &attr.value_len);
00055       attrs.push_back(attr);
00056     }
00057     m_master->open(&cb, m_session_id, name, flags, event_mask, attrs);
00058   }
00059   catch (Exception &e) {
00060     HT_ERROR_OUT << e << HT_END;
00061     cb.error(e.code(), "Error handling Hyperspace open");
00062   }
00063 }
